SEARCH
Package gui

Class UserInterface

java.lang.Object
gui.UserInterface
public class UserInterface extends Object

User Interface Class

This class takes care of application interface where user can interact with the system from this view class.
Author:
Mohamed Essam, Maya Ayman, Rawan Younis

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    UserInterface()
    Default Constructor.
    It loads all the item data from the database,
    and put it on the catalog page.

  • Method Details

    • systemSteps

      public void systemSteps() throws InterruptedException
      This Method shows the system steps
      from the main menu page to catalog page,
      checkout page, receipt page ...
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - in case of database error

    • register

      public User register() throws SQLException
      This method used to register a new user to the system.
      Returns:
      user to be used later
      Throws:
      SQLException - to handle database errors

      public User logIn()
      This method used to log into the system.
      Returns:
      user to be used later

      public void forgotPassword(User user)
      This method used to enter a new password for a registered user.
      Parameters:
      user - that want to change his password

      This method contains check-out Logic.

      public Integer showCart()
